attributes.action: Removal of F65 and more BDSM rights
attributes.additional_details:
Bondage and Discipline, Dominance and Submission, or Sadism and Masochism (BDSM) is part of humanity and our sexuality.
Therefore this petition is for the removal of Fetishism (a unnatural love of...) examples: Being a petrolhead (lover of cars) is classed as fetishism, Being into fashion is a fetish (love of clothes etc.)
and SM as psychiatric diagnoses from the ICD, the International Classification of Diseases.
Since this is classed as sexuality, therefore people who are into BDSM are not mentally ill; while also stopping the Home Office from being constrictive on images of BDSM in action.
